attributes.additional_details:
MURDER IS MURDER. If a "human being" murders another human then they get a life sentence but if they murder an animal they get a few months. Animals have no voice. We need to stand up for them! Animals suffer in pain and die without any justice! What's a few months in prison? Murderers are murderers end of. We need to wise up and start realising animal cruelty cannot go in forever. We need to act now.
I want to see these "people" who abus animals have bigger sentences than a few months. We are to easy on these so called "people." THEY SHOULD DO THE SAME TIME FOR KILLING AN INNOCENT ANIMAL AS THEY WOULD A HUMAN BEING!
If we act now, we can minimise the chances of animal cruelty.
Thank you for reading and I hope use take this into deep consideration!
